response.explain: The task goal is to cook bacon. From the observed objects and relations, we can see that the bacon is currently inside the fridge, on top of a tray. The fridge is closed. The first step to cook the bacon is to open the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the bacon out of the fridge
(3) Turn on the stove
(4) Cook the bacon on the stove
response.code:
